xml.data:
Home » 36P1 Dhammānuloma (1), Tikapaṭṭhānapāḷi (1) » 2 Kusalattika » 2.7 Pañhāvāra » 2.7.2 Paccayapaccanīya » 2.7.2.1 Saṅkhyāvāra » Napacchājātaduka
Dasaka
Kusalattika
Pañhāvāra
Paccayapaccanīya
Saṅkhyāvāra
Napacchājātaduka
Dasaka
1223Napacchājātapaccayā nahetupaccayā naārammaṇapaccayā naadhipatipaccayā naanantarapaccayā nasamanantarapaccayā nasahajātapaccayā naaññamaññapaccayā nanissayapaccayā naupanissaye tīṇi, napurejāte nava, naāsevane nava, nakamme nava, navipāke nava, naāhāre nava, naindriye nava, najhāne nava, namagge nava, nasampayutte nava, navippayutte nava, noatthiyā nava, nonatthiyā nava, novigate nava, noavigate nava.
<< Aṭṭhakaup Ekādasaka >>
